name: Grave Robert (Zeldatechie, Zolrak22, marikap)
description:
Description(scroll below for controls)
 In Grave Robert, you play as Robert, a thief who finds more than he bargained for when he stumbles into a sacred graveyard filled with undead bosses.  It's up to his resilience, resourcefulness, and most of all, his stubbornness, to create makeshift weapons and survive the onslaught. Will Robert profit off this supernatural kerfuffle and escape the graveyard? Or will he become a permanent resident? Only you can decide his fate!  

 

Controls with keyboard MoveAimDash AttackCraft makeshift items Cycle between items Pause game Controls with controller [ Action ] [ Playstation ][ Xbox ][ Switch ]Move   AimDashAttack Craft makeshift itemsCycle between itemsPause game

 

Credits Music & SFX Marika Perlmutter 3D Artist Matthew Herwig 2D Artist Amanda Freeman Gameplay Programmer Jesús ”ZeldaTechie” Reyes Emotional Support Squid & Gameplay Programmer CthulhuReigns Cthulhu’s Handler & Producer Carlos Polo Development Tool Programmer Vincent Kyne
